description: ... to use QTI in ubu21. Dear autor, russian science is very grateful!

first try: "this feature is only available in the pro version, please buy a contract"
This is not what I call "free software".

The program is a good option for scintific plots. I used it for years but in 22.04 I can't run yet, because of libraries problems. Specifically the terminal shows "the error while loading shared libraries: libmuparser.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"
Maybe work to try to fix the problem
summary: Don't run on 22.04 due to problems with libraries
